description: This notification is generated when an attempt is made to add a new
DHCP binding entry when the binding table is full. The value of
bsDhcpSnoopingNotificationClientMACAddr gives the MAC address that
could not be added to the binding table. This notification also
indicates that additional untrusted DHCP packets will not be added to
the binding table and will be dropped.

event.Summary: DHCP snooping binding table is full

description: This value indicates the client MAC Address of a dropped DHCP packet.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingNotificationClientMACAddr

description: This notification is generated when a DHCP packet is dropped.

event.Summary: $v2 packet is dropped

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingTrap BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingNotificationSourcePort u 9999 BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingNotificationMsgType i 1 BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingNotificationSourceMACAddr s EXAMPL BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingNotificationClientMACAddr s EXAMPL BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingIfTrusted i 1

description: This value identifies the source port number of a dropped DHCP packet.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingNotificationSourcePort

description: This value indicates the message type of a dropped DHCP packet.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingNotificationMsgType

description: This value indicates the source MAC Address of a dropped DHCP packet.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingNotificationSourceMACAddr

description: This value indicates the client MAC Address of a dropped DHCP packet.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingNotificationClientMACAddr

description: This object is used to control whether this interface is trusted
for DHCP snooping purposes.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingIfTrusted

description: This notification is generated when the DHCP Option 82 information
could not be added to a DHCP packet because the resulting packet
would be too long.

event.Summary: DHCP packet failed to add option 82 info because the packet max length exceeded

description: This notification is generated when a DHCP snooping binding entry is
not restored from an external file due to a MAC conflict.

event.Summary: MAC conflict detected

description: The MAC address of a DHCP client for which some event occurred.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingNotificationsBindingMacAddress

description: This notification is generated when a DHCP snooping binding entry is
not restored from an external file due to an unexisting interface.

event.Summary: Invalid interface $v2 detected

description: The MAC address of a DHCP client for which some event occurred.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingNotificationsBindingMacAddress

description: The interface to which the DHCP client is connected.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingBindingInterface

description: This notification is generated when a DHCP snooping binding entry is
not restored from an external file because the client lease expired.

event.Summary: Client lease expired

description: The MAC address of a DHCP client for which some event occurred.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingNotificationsBindingMacAddress

description: This notification is generated when a DHCP snooping binding entry is
not restored from an external file due to a parsing failure.

event.Summary: DHCP $v1 snooping binding entry failed to restore due to parsing failure

description: The MAC address of a DHCP client for which some event occurred.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingNotificationsBindingMacAddress

description: This notification is generated when enabling the DHCP snooping external
saves feature without synchronizing the switch to a NTP server.

event.Summary: DHCP snooping external feature saved without synchronizing the switch to NTP server

description: This notification is generated after successfully saving the DHCP
snooping binding table to a USB drive external file.

event.Summary: DHCP snooping binding table successfully saved to USB drive external file

description: This object indicates the unit number of the USB port to be
used in file save/restore operations.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingExtSaveUsbTargetUnit

description: This notification is generated after successfully saving the DHCP
snooping binding table to a TFTP server external file.

event.Summary: DHCP snooping binding table successfully saved to the TFTP server $v2 external file

description: This object indicates the type of address stored in the related
object bsDhcpSnoopingExtSaveTftpServerInetAddress.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingExtSaveTftpServerAddressType

description: The IP address of the TFTP server on which to save the binding
information.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingExtSaveTftpServerAddress

description: This notification is generated after unsuccessfully saving the DHCP
snooping binding table to a USB drive external file.

event.Summary: DHCP snooping binding table was not saved to the USB drive external file

description: This object indicates the unit number of the USB port to be
used in file save/restore operations.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingExtSaveUsbTargetUnit

description: This notification is generated after unsuccessfully saving the DHCP
snooping binding table to a TFTP server external file.

event.Summary: DHCP snooping binding table was not saved to the TFTP server $v2 external file

description: This object indicates the type of address stored in the related
object bsDhcpSnoopingExtSaveTftpServerInetAddress.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingExtSaveTftpServerAddressType

description: The IP address of the TFTP server on which to save the binding
information.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingExtSaveTftpServerAddress

description: This notification is generated after successfully restoring the DHCP
snooping binding table from a USB drive external file.

event.Summary: DHCP snooping table successfully restored from USB drive external file

description: This object indicates the unit number of the USB port to be
used in file save/restore operations.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingExtSaveUsbTargetUnit

description: This notification is generated after successfully restoring the DHCP
snooping binding table from a TFTP server external file.

event.Summary: DHCP snooping table successfully restored from TFTP server $v2 external file

description: This object indicates the type of address stored in the related
object bsDhcpSnoopingExtSaveTftpServerInetAddress.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingExtSaveTftpServerAddressType

description: The IP address of the TFTP server on which to save the binding
information.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingExtSaveTftpServerAddress

description: This notification is generated after unsuccessfully restoring the DHCP
snooping binding table from a USB drive external file.

event.Summary: DHCP snooping table failed to restore from USB drive external file

description: This object indicates the unit number of the USB port to be
used in file save/restore operations.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingExtSaveUsbTargetUnit

description: This notification is generated after unsuccessfully restoring the DHCP
snooping binding table from a TFTP server external file.

event.Summary: DHCP snooping table failed to restore from TFTP server $v2 external file

description: This object indicates the type of address stored in the related
object bsDhcpSnoopingExtSaveTftpServerInetAddress.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingExtSaveTftpServerAddressType

description: The IP address of the TFTP server on which to save the binding
information.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingExtSaveTftpServerAddress

description: This notification is generated when a DHCP snooping binding entry is
not restored from an external file because VLAN requirements are not met:
VLAN must exist, VLAN must be DHCP snooping enabled, binding entry
unit/port must be a part of the VLAN.

event.Summary: DHCP snooping binding entry is not restored due to invalid VLAN $v2

description: The MAC address of a DHCP client for which some event occurred.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingNotificationsBindingMacAddress

description: The VLAN to which the DHCP client belongs.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingBindingVlanId

description: This notification is generated after successfully saving the DHCP
snooping binding table to a SFTP server external file.

event.Summary: DHCP snooping binding table successfully saved to SFTP server $v2 external file

description: This object indicates the type of address stored in the related

variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingExtSaveSftpServerAddressType

description: This notification is generated when a DHCP snooping binding entry is
not restored from an external file on a trusted interface.

event.Summary: DHCP snooping binding entry is not restored from external file on trusted interface

description: The MAC address of a DHCP client for which some event occurred.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingNotificationsBindingMacAddress

variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingIfTrusted

description: This notification is generated when a DHCP packet is dropped because
a static entry with the same MAC address was found in the binding table.

event.Summary: DHCP packet dropped due to static entry MAC conflict

description: This value indicates the source MAC Address of a dropped DHCP packet.
variables.name: BAY-STACK-DHCP-SNOOPING-MIB::bsDhcpSnoopingNotificationSourceMACAddr

description: The ifIndex value of the interface.
